item.title: The doors of Grand Mercure Qingdao Nanshan Resort are now open
item.description:
Source: AccorHotels. The Grand Mercure Qingdao Nanshan Resort. AccorHotels has recently added the Grand Mercure Qingdao Nanshan Resort to its portfolio. This marks the second Grand Mercure establishment in Qingdao, following the Grand Mercure Qingdao Airport, and the fourteenth in Greater China. Michel Molliet, Chief Operating Officer of AccorHotels Greater China, expressed enthusiasm, stating that the resort is a valuable addition to the Grand Mercure network in Shandong province’s largest coastal city...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-doors-of-grand-mercure-qingdao-nanshan-resort-are-now-open/
